import React from 'react'; import { Route } from 'react-router-dom'; function PrivacyPolicy() { return (

Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy Climate Co is committed to protecting the privacy of our customers and users of our website. This Privacy Policy outlines the information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to protect it. Information Collection We may collect personal information from our customers and users of our website, including but not limited to name, address, email, phone number, and payment information. This information is collected for the purpose of providing heating and cooling services and to improve the user experience on our website. Use of Information The personal information collected by Climate Co will only be used for the purpose of providing heating and cooling services, processing payments, and for communication with customers. This information may also be used to improve the user experience on our website, provide promotional offers, and to send newsletters. Protection of Information Climate Co takes the protection of personal information very seriously. We use industry-standard security measures to protect personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. Sharing of Information Climate Co will not sell or share personal information with third parties without the consent of the customer. However, we may share information with third parties who are necessary for the provision of heating and cooling services, such as contractors and suppliers. Cookies Our website uses cookies to improve the user experience and to collect information about website usage. Cookies are small text files stored on the user's device that can be used to track website usage and preferences. Users can choose to disable cookies in their browser settings, but this may impact the functionality of our website. Changes to Privacy Policy Climate Co reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be communicated through our website and will become effective immediately upon posting. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at 1300 513 799. This Privacy Policy was last updated on 14/02/2023.

); } export default PrivacyPolicy;
